game.name: Train Simulator: Western Maryland BL2 Loco Add-On
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 다운로드 가능한 콘텐츠, Steam 도전 과제, 컨트롤러 완벽 지원, Steam 트레이딩 카드, Steam 창작마당, 앱 내 구매, Steam Cloud, Steam 순위표, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: The distinctive Electro-Motive BL2, envisioned by legendary EMD chief engineer Richard “Dick” Dilworth as a diesel road-switcher with style and panache, is ready for Train Simulator duty!
game.shortDescriptionEn: The distinctive Electro-Motive BL2, envisioned by legendary EMD chief engineer Richard “Dick” Dilworth as a diesel road-switcher with style and panache, is ready for Train Simulator duty!
